name: Lisa: The Pointless
storyline: A fangame based on the world of Austin Jorgensen's Lisa The Painful, Lisa The Pointless follows Alex, a garbage man who ends up dumped on Garbage Island, a land full of those who believe nothing could ever be better than the disgusting conditions they currently reside in. Desperate to get off the island and do something with his life, Alex teams up with Joel, a resident of Garbage Island who has recently found one of the last remaining bullets for his custom pistol. The two journey through the post-apocalyptic world, trying to make sense of their surroundings and understand point of their journey altogether.
summary: LISA: The Pointless is in equal parts a story about a garbage man trying to run away from the world and the story of that very world he is trying to escape.
